name: Frog
description: Jumping champions who love water and land!
funFact: Frogs drink water through their skin!

name: Toad
description: Bumpy friends who prefer dry places.
funFact: Toads have poison behind their eyes to protect themselves!

name: Salamander
description: Lizard-like amphibians with super regeneration powers!
funFact: They can regrow lost tails and even legs!

name: Axolotl
description: The forever-baby amphibian with a cute smile!
funFact: They never grow up fully and stay underwater their whole life!

name: Newt
description: Colorful little swimmers with bright bellies.
funFact: Some newts are poisonous with bright colors as warning!

name: Caecilian
description: Legless amphibians that look like worms or snakes!
funFact: They have tiny eyes covered by skin ‚Äì they sense vibrations instead!

name: Tree Frog
description: Sticky-toed climbers who live in trees!
funFact: Their feet work like suction cups to climb smooth leaves!

name: Bullfrog
description: Big, loud frogs with deep croaks!
funFact: They can jump 10 times their body length!
